name: part_002
file: tmp_【#白上フブキ生誕LIVE】Congrats Birthday FOX【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ】 [7Vs-5Rwu8ks]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

subtitles.original: 夢も見せるわ 私は今 孤独の海
subtitles.english: I'll even show you dreams. I am now in a sea of solitude.

subtitles.original: 黒い靴脱ぎ ステップ踏んで
subtitles.english: Taking off my black shoes, I take a step.

subtitles.original: 悲しみも 癒しましょう
subtitles.english: Let's heal even the sadness.

subtitles.original: 旅人よ 明日に迷う夜は 私の胸に帰りなさい
subtitles.english: Oh traveler, on nights you lose your way to tomorrow, return to my breast.

subtitles.original: 悲しみ知るほど 潤う月は 今日も輝く ひらひら揺れながら
subtitles.english: The moon, moist with the more sadness it knows, shines today too, swaying flutteringly.

subtitles.original: 燃える想い 奏でるギター
subtitles.english: A burning feeling, the guitar plays.

subtitles.original: 満たされなさを 紡ぐでしょう
subtitles.english: It will probably weave the feeling of unfulfillment.

subtitles.original: 旅人よ 明日に迷う夜は 私の胸に帰りなさい
subtitles.english: Oh traveler, on nights you lose your way to tomorrow, return to my breast.

subtitles.original: 悲しみ知るほど 潤う月は 今日も輝く ひらひら揺れながら
subtitles.english: The moon, moist with the more sadness it knows, shines today too, swaying flutteringly.

subtitles.original: 旅人よ 傷跡痛むのなら 私の胸で眠りなさい
subtitles.english: Oh traveler, if your scars ache, sleep in my breast.

subtitles.original: 慈しみながら 包んで あなただけ 照らすの 今宵の月のように
subtitles.english: Enveloping with affection, I'll shine only on you, like tonight's moon.

subtitles.original: 恋空予報 / 作詞・作曲: koyori
subtitles.english: Renku Yohou / Lyrics & Composition: koyori

subtitles.original: ドキ ドキ ドキ しちゃってる
subtitles.english: My heart's going throb, throb, throb.

subtitles.original: あいつは 全然 気づかないな
subtitles.english: That guy doesn't notice at all.

subtitles.original: 本当は もっと 話したいのに
subtitles.english: I actually want to talk more, but...

subtitles.original: しつこいなんて 思われてもな
subtitles.english: I'm worried he might think I'm annoying.

subtitles.original: 授業中も 上の空だし
subtitles.english: In class, my mind's elsewhere too.

subtitles.original: こんなの 悔しいけど 仕方ないな
subtitles.english: This is frustrating, but it can't be helped.

subtitles.original: 恋空予報 かなわないかも
subtitles.english: The love sky forecast might not come true.

subtitles.original: 晴れのち曇りで 雨が降るでしょう
subtitles.english: It'll probably be sunny, then cloudy, then rainy.

subtitles.original: あいつの笑顔 いつも見とれて
subtitles.english: Always staring blankly at his smile,

subtitles.original: 私 本日 恋してる模様
subtitles.english: It seems I'm in love today.

subtitles.original: ほら ほら もたもたしてると
subtitles.english: Look, look, if you dally,

subtitles.original: あっと言う間に あいつは帰るぞ
subtitles.english: That guy will go home in the blink of an eye.

subtitles.original: 今までずっと 言えなかったけど
subtitles.english: I haven't been able to say it until now, but...

subtitles.original: 本当はずっと 好きだったから
subtitles.english: Because I've actually liked you all along.

subtitles.original: 答えは待って すぐに言わないで
subtitles.english: Wait for the answer, don't say it right away.

subtitles.original: 耳をふさぎたくて ただ怖くて
subtitles.english: I want to cover my ears, I'm just scared.

subtitles.original: 恋空予報 叶えてお願い
subtitles.english: Love sky forecast, please come true.

subtitles.original: 雨が降ってるけど 一緒に帰ろう
subtitles.english: It's raining, but let's go home together.

subtitles.original: あいつのことばかり いつも思い出して
subtitles.english: Always remembering only things about him,

subtitles.original: 私 明日も 恋してる模様
subtitles.english: It seems I'll be in love tomorrow too.

subtitles.original: 遠くかかる虹 ふわり混ざる夕陽
subtitles.english: A distant rainbow, a softly blending sunset.

subtitles.original: 傘を畳んで 手を繋いだ
subtitles.english: Folding the umbrella, we held hands.

subtitles.original: 幸せもの 今日も 恋空予報
subtitles.english: A lucky person, today too, the love sky forecast.
